Instruction: Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) and lightly grease a 9x9 inch baking pan.

Combine and spread a mix of cornmeal and flour thinly on a baking sheet. Bake until lightly browned, around 10 minutes. Allow it to cool, then increase the oven temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Mix the cornmeal mixture, salt, sugar, and baking powder together in a bowl. Add shortening and milk, and stir until well combined.
